INSERT INTO COMMUNITY_COMMENT (COMMENT_NUMBER, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMUNITY_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER) VALUES (#{commentNumber}, #{commentContent}, #{communityNumber}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NUMBER, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE, COMMUNITY_NUMBER, R.USER_NUMBER, USER_ID, USER_BELONG,P.PFP_SYSTEM_NAME, P.PFP_UUID FROM WW_USER U JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMENT R ON COMMUNITY_NUMBER = #{communityNumber} AND U.USER_NUMBER = R.USER_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_PFP P ON U.USER_NUMBER = P.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY COMMENT_NUMBER DESC

SELECT R.COMMENT_NUMBER, R.COMMENT_CONTENT, R.COMMENT_DATE, R.COMMUNITY_NUMBER, R.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_ID, U.USER_BELONG, P.PFP_SYSTEM_NAME, P.PFP_UUID, NVL(CCU.UD_STATUS,'x') AS UD_STATUS ,(SELECT COUNT(UD_STATUS) FROM COMMUNITY_COMMENT_UD WHERE COMMUNITY_COMMENT_UD.COMMENT_NUMBER = R.COMMENT_NUMBER AND CCU.UD_STATUS = 'u') AS UD_CNT FROM WW_USER U JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMENT R ON COMMUNITY_NUMBER = #{communityNumber} AND U.USER_NUMBER = R.USER_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMUNITY_COMMENT_UD CCU ON R.COMMENT_NUMBER = CCU.COMMENT_NUMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_PFP P ON R.USER_NUMBER = P.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY R.COMMENT_NUMBER DESC
